missions.name: Evacuation
missions.setup:
Add a Priority Objective token to the Front Hangar and Rear Hangar. |set evacCount `shuffle 0 1 1 1 1 2 2;`|
Add Mission tokens:
•Clabburn Range: |get evacCount 0|
•Front Hangar: |get evacCount 1|
•Rear Hangar: |get evacCount 2|
•Medical Centre: |get evacCount 3|
•Command Centre: |get evacCount 4|
•Barracks: |get evacCount 5|
•Shield Generator: |get evacCount 6|
missions.tokens:
•When a Unit Moves from one room to another, it may also move all Mission tokens from the room it started in to the room it ended in.
•At the end of the enemy Primary Character's turn, if there are more enemy characters than Mission tokens in a room, discard one Mission token from that room.

abilities.name: Launch Transport
abilities.desc: Rescue all Mission tokens in the room this character is in.

missions.goal: Rescue 5 Mission tokens from around the map.

missions.name: Lost Search Party
missions.setup: Add a Priority Objective token to the Clabburn Range.
missions.tokens: When a Unit makes a Move action, a character in that Unit may also move a Mission token within {g} 1 to a location within {g} 1 of its ending location.

abilities.name: Search
abilities.desc:
Roll 1 Attack die:
{b} or {c}: You find the Lost Search Party! Add a Mission token within {g} 1 of this Unit.
{a}: Nothing happens...
{d}: Lost in the Snow: This Unit gains {4}.

missions.goal: Find a Mission token in the Clabburn Range using the Search {j} action and bring it to the Medical Centre.

missions.name: Repair the Shield Generator
missions.setup: Add a Priority Objective token to the Shield Generator. Put 4 Mission tokens there.
missions.tokens: Whenever an enemy Unit makes an attack in the Shield Generator, add a Mission token there.

abilities.name: Repair
abilities.desc: Remove 1 Mission token from the Shield Generator.

missions.goal: Remove all Mission tokens from the Shield Generator.

missions.name: Exfiltration
missions.setup: Add a Priority Objective token to the Command Centre.
missions.tokens: When a Unit makes a Move action, a character in that Unit may also move a Mission token within {g} 1 to a location within {g} 1 of its ending location.

abilities.name: Slice
abilities.desc:
Roll 1 Attack die:
{b} or {c}: You copied the data to a Datacard! Add a Mission token within {g} 1 of this Unit.
{a}: Locked Out: This ability cannot be used for the next 2 turns.
{d}: Caught: Put a new enemy Supporting Unit with 2 characters within {g} 2 of this Unit.

missions.goal: Find a Mission token in the Command Centre using the Slice {j} action and bring it to either the Front Hangar or Rear Hangar.

missions.name: Deactivate the Shield Generator
missions.setup: Add a Priority Objective token to the Shield Generator.

pool.name: Blizzard
pool.desc: Leave this card in play after resolving its effects. All Units in Clabburn Range or Shield Generator suffer {q} for each Blizzard card in play.

pool.name: Ambushed!
pool.desc: Put a new enemy Supporting Unit with 4 characters within {g} 3 of the player character nearest to the enemy Primary Unit.

pool.name: Somehow, Luke Skywalker Returned
pool.desc: Add two Priority Objective tokens to Medical Centre. Then, place Luke Skywalker, Mildly Hypothermic in a Bacta Tank there and put an Injury token on him. Add him as a supporting character to the Rebel Alliance faction. Remove the two Priority Tokens if Luke Skywalker leaves the Bacta Tank.

abilities.name: Bacta Tank Bath
abilities.desc: If a Unit is within {g} 1 of an empty Bacta Tank, you may place it into the Bacta Tank. While there, it cannot make any actions except to move within {g} 1 of the Bacta Tank and cannot use defence expertise ({f}) results. At the end of its activation, if it is still in the Bacta Tank, it may {rrr}. If it has no {q}, it may instead remove an Injured token and suffer {q} until it has one Stamina ({r}) remaining.
